titleLong: Business Beetles: A chill simulation game

images.description: Beetles go about their business during the day. Sales-beetles look for customers, make sales, and return with money balls to the office.
You see your stats and allocate new recruits at the end of each day.
Mafia crows want to take your money! Also, you can speed-up time.

videos.description: A gameplay video for Business Beetles.
